name: NATIONWIDE MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY v. Katrina JOHNSON, Sheleatha Collins and Tiffany Collins v. Arthur FARQUHARSON and Prudential Insurance Company of America. Appeal of Katrina JOHNSON, Sheleatha Collins and Tiffany Collins

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
parties: NATIONWIDE MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY v. Katrina JOHNSON, Sheleatha Collins and Tiffany Collins v. Arthur FARQUHARSON and Prudential Insurance Company of America. Appeal of Katrina JOHNSON, Sheleatha Collins and Tiffany Collins.
attorneys: Olugbenga 0. Abiona, Philadelphia, for K. Johnson, S. collins and T. Collins.
Audrey Jacobsen Copeland, Berwyn, for Nationwide Mut. Ins. Co.
casebody.head_matter:
704 A.2d 127
NATIONWIDE MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY v. Katrina JOHNSON, Sheleatha Collins and Tiffany Collins v. Arthur FARQUHARSON and Prudential Insurance Company of America. Appeal of Katrina JOHNSON, Sheleatha Collins and Tiffany Collins.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 21, 1997.
Decided Jan. 6, 1998.
Olugbenga 0. Abiona, Philadelphia, for K. Johnson, S. collins and T. Collins.
Audrey Jacobsen Copeland, Berwyn, for Nationwide Mut. Ins. Co.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
